/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApErpFormBDao.selectApErpFormB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = M.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.ERP_FORM_ID, T.COMP_ID, T.ERP_FORM_TYP_CD, T.RESC_ID, T.REG_URL, T.INFM_URL,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM,
FROM AP_ERP_FORM_B T, AP_RESC_D R
AND R.COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND R.LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko') AND R.RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND R.RESC_VA LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') AND T.ERP_FORM_ID = #{erpFormId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.ERP_FORM_TYP_CD = #{erpFormTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ERP_FORM_ID
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
